Below is the schema for configuring pywaspgen.burst_datagen.BurstDatagen and pywaspgen.iq_datagen.IQDatagen objects.

  • generation

type

minimum

minimum

integer

minimum

2

string

Maximum number of signals to generate

integer

minimum

1

Flag to allow collisions

type

boolean

  • max_attempts

Maximum number of attempts to generate a signal
